articles.title: Benchmark in talks to lead Series A for Greptile, valuing AI-code reviewer at $180M, sources say
articles.description: YC alum Greptile raises $30M Series A.

articles.title: Why a Y Combinator startup tackling AI agents for Windows gave up and pivoted
articles.description: Pig.dev was working on a problem that could have been revolutionary: agent tech for controlling Windows desktops.

articles.title: ServiceNow’s acquisition of Moveworks is reportedly being reviewed over antitrust concerns
articles.description: The probe into the acquisition, which was announced in March, began in June according to sources familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Cursor snaps up enterprise startup Koala in challenge to GitHub Copilot

articles.description: Mistral AI, the French company behind AI assistant Le Chat and several foundational models, is officially regarded as one of France’s most promising

articles.title: A surveillance vendor was caught exploiting a new SS7 attack to track people’s phone locations
articles.description: The new SS7 bypass attack tricks phone operators into disclosing a cell subscriber's location, in some cases down to a few hundred meters.
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: CaaStle founder charged with fraud, turns herself in
articles.description: The US Attorney for the Southern District of New York unsealed an indictment against Christine Hunsicker, charging her with wire fraud, securities
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: SpaceX worker injury rates at Starbase outpace industry rivals
articles.description: SpaceX has been moving at a breakneck pace, and rapid progress comes at a cost. Worker injury rates at its Starbase facility are almost 6x higher
articles.author: Aria Alamalhodaei

articles.title: DuckDuckGo now lets you hide AI-generated images in search results
articles.description: DuckDuckGo's new search feature comes as the internet is being flooded with AI-generated slop.

articles.title: With her app Smash, Kesha can be whoever she wants — even a tech CEO
articles.description: Kesha is building an app called Smash, which is a way for musicians to find one another, make music together, and establish clear, artist-friendly
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Meta refuses to sign EU’s AI code of practice
articles.description: Meta will not sign the EU's new rules, calling the implementation "overreach" and claiming it will throttle AI development.

articles.title: Netflix starts using GenAI in its shows and films
articles.description: Netflix said it used generative AI for the first time for a scene in an Argentinean show called "El Eternauta."

articles.title: Perplexity sees India as a shortcut in its race against OpenAI
